aws:requesttag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tag key-value pairs in the request

aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tags attached to the resource

aws:tagkeys.description: Filters access by the tag keys in the request

iottwinmaker:destinationtype.description: Filters access by destination type of metadata transfer job

iottwinmaker:linkedservices.description: Filters access by workspace linked to services

iottwinmaker:sourcetype.description: Filters access by source type of metadata transfer job
